trans-unit.source: To install Update 1.2 from the Azure classic portal
trans-unit.target: To install Update 1.2 from the Azure classic portal

trans-unit.source: In the Azure classic portal, go to the **Devices** page and select your device.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure classic portal, go to the **Devices** page and select your device.

trans-unit.source: Under **Network Interfaces**, first verify that you have at least one network interface that is iSCSI-enabled.
trans-unit.target: Under **Network Interfaces**, first verify that you have at least one network interface that is iSCSI-enabled.

trans-unit.source: Then locate the network interface (other than DATA 0) that has a gateway assigned.
trans-unit.target: Then locate the network interface (other than DATA 0) that has a gateway assigned.

trans-unit.source: Disable the network interface that has an assigned gateway and save the modified configuration.
trans-unit.target: Disable the network interface that has an assigned gateway and save the modified configuration.

trans-unit.source: Note the network interface settings are retained and so when you re-enable this network interface later, the portal will revert to the original settings.
trans-unit.target: Note the network interface settings are retained and so when you re-enable this network interface later, the portal will revert to the original settings.

trans-unit.source: You can now [use the Azure classic portal to install Update 1.2](#install-update-12-via-the-azure-classic-portal).
trans-unit.target: You can now [use the Azure classic portal to install Update 1.2](#install-update-12-via-the-azure-classic-portal).

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions starting from step 3 of this procedure.
trans-unit.target: Follow the instructions starting from step 3 of this procedure.

trans-unit.source: After you have installed all the updates, you can re-enable the network interface that you disabled.
trans-unit.target: After you have installed all the updates, you can re-enable the network interface that you disabled.
